summary: The module showcases a complete workflow for training a MoNet (Mixture Model Network) on a citation graph dataset using DGL and PyTorch. It defines a lightweight neural network with GMMConv layers, loads a standard citation dataset, parses runtime options, executes a training loop, and evaluates node classification performance.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example that helps researchers and engineers quickly prototype and benchmark MoNet‑based graph neural networks for node classification on citation networks, demonstrating integration of DGL data pipelines with PyTorch models.
